Name: Mint Julep (Mexican Style)
Instructions: PLACE lemon zest and mint in shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Mint, cognac, port, lemon and maraschino - all subtly contribute to this Cuban take on Mexico.
History: Recipe adapted from a 1937 Bar Florida (later renamed Floridita) menu, Havana, Cuba. The contentious history of the Julep , along with its variants can be found on our page.
